channel.title: Tom Lukiwski

item.title: Mentioned by Herald
item.description:
Lukiwski seeking nomination in new Moose Jaw riding - Moose Jaw Times
Tom Lukiwski, currently MP of Regina-Lumsden-Lake Centre, will seek nomination Austin M. Davis. Tom Lukiwski, currently MP of Regina-Lumsden-Lake Centre, will seek nomination in the newly created Moose Jaw-Lake Centre-Lanigan riding. Justin Crann ...

item.title: Mentioned by News Talk 980 CJME
item.description:
Regina MP Tom Lukiwski to run for rural side of riding split
Like it or not, Conservative MP Tom Lukiwski will have to prepare for his riding to be cleft in twain. The federal electoral boundaries commission has finished redrawing the federal election riding map in Saskatchewan. Their report was tabled in the House of ...

item.title: Mentioned by Post
item.description:
Boundaries commission backs urban-only ridings - Regina Leader
But Conservative MP Tom Lukiwski rejects that, citing the huge rural ridings that are being created by the commission. Moose Jaw-Lake Centre-Lanigan, where he intends to run, will stretch from the acreages south of Saskatoon to rural areas south of Moose ...

item.title: Mentioned by globalnews.ca
item.description:
City wants more signatures collected for P3 petition
REGINA – “And finally ladies and gentlemen, let's just say it's no secret that there are some opponents to this project,” concluded Tom Lukiwski, MP for Regina-Lumsden-Lake Centre after his announcement at city hall Friday morning that the federal government is kicking in some money for Regina's new wastewater treatment plant. But there weren't any opponents at the news conference: doors were locked as the mayor and Member of Parliament made the joint announcement. Story continues below. “We weren't ...
